Meme-ji allows you to explore, view, and share a diverse collection of memes
fetched from an online source.

Features:
* View memes from an online JSON database.
* Browse memes by categories automatically generated from tags.
* Search for memes by name or tag.
* Share memes easily with other apps.
* Download memes to your device.
* Includes an optional 'Cutie Mode' setting to hide potentially sensitive
  content tagged '18+'.
* Checks for app updates via GitHub (Note: F-Droid provides updates via the
  F-Droid client).
